bibl.title: Asian Trade in Antiquity.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: D.S. Richards and B. Cassirer (Edd.), Islam and the Trade of Asia (1970). - Covers the period from the accession of Augustus (30 B.C.) to the Arab conquest (A.D. 633-41). The area is mainly that of the Roman empire, Syria, Palestine, Egypt (including Hejaz, Yemen, Hadhramaut and â€˜Iraq).
